title: Seeking email address of Bill Troop
content:
I am interested in contacting Bill Troop for an off-line discussion. Please let me know if you have a mail or email address.  
Thank you

 [‹ Typography article on Slate.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125703/http:/typophile.com/node/46240 "Go to previous forum topic") [Flash Player has a new text engine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125703/http:/typophile.com/node/45368 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nstockallen

comments.content:
Have you tried the contact on this page?: [http://www.graphos.org/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125703/http:/www.graphos.org/index.html "http://www.graphos.org/index.html")  
This is indeed the same Bill Troop.
